person.persName: Lafayette Shaw (Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney and judge)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet McDonald Shaw. Father of William M. Shaw. Democratic delegate to the Congressional Convention at Newport, Kentucky, in 1859. Attorney in Kenton County in 1860. Presiding judge of the Kenton County Court from 1861 to 1865.

bibl.p: "Democratic Convention," Tri-Weekly Kentucky Yeoman (Frankfort, Ky.), May 21, 1859, p. 2; Find A Grave, "Lafayette Shaw (1825-1912)," Memorial #90470881, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=90470881&ref=acom (accessed May 23, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0307; KYR-0001-029-0525.
